Key:
Yeah. Seems like Arusu is setting up unusual date
scenarios again.
Shido, I'm sorry. I've... troubled you.

Y-Yeah. It seemed like you weren't your usual
self. Honestly, I was surprised, but...
Don't worry about it.

But, as long as you remember, I can't pretend it
didn't happen. So as an apology, you can approach
me this time.
